name: Nomad: The Space Pirate
overview: A shooter, created by Mike Poullas that is part of "Sky Fighters" game pack. Who says being a buccaneer doesn't pay? The question should be, will it pay enough? That is what you, Nomad, the space pirate, want to find out as you twist and turn through the outer reaches of the galaxy. You must evade those who want your hard earned cargo of precious metals. Beware, the more ore you recover, the more determined your foes become! The further you go, the more obstacles you must avoid. Can you survive as a space pirate?
